sentences.english: Increased interaction between the police and citizens will improve the rate of solving crimes.
sentences.chinese: 警民之间加强合作将有助于提高破案率。

sentences.english: A strong Police-community partnership is the key to maintaining a safe city.
sentences.chinese: 强大的警民关系是保障安全的关键。

sentences.english: There have been other sporadic clashes with police.
sentences.chinese: 其他零星警民冲突亦时有发生。

sentences.english: Obama also believes the bill undermines the fair and police trust. U. S.
sentences.chinese: 美国总统奥巴马也认为此法案损害了公平及警民互信。

definition: cadres and masses/party officials and ordinary people
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
close relationship as between fish and water
police classification/subdivision of policing activities (traffic, border guard, criminal etc)
(of police, fire brigade etc) to receive a report of an incident
